bug.author: abhinavsp0730
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/community/forums.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/community/forums.md</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of the issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
In forums.ms <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/community/#get_help>how to get help</denchmark-link> is broken and while clicking it's showing 404 error. <denchmark-h:h3>submit a pull request</denchmark-h>
Hey, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MarkDaoust>@MarkDaoust</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lamberta>@lamberta</denchmark-link> would you please assign me this issue and please provide details to fix this issue I'll love to fix this issue.

comments.comment: I think you have to open a PR against <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs</denchmark-link>

Hey, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mihaimaruseac>@mihaimaruseac</denchmark-link> thank you for your quick reply. I've searched through github repo to find the correct link but I'm unable to find it. So, my question is does exist or not, If not then we must have to change it for more help mail it to or we will link Tensorflow google group link.

Maybe this should be the link <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community>https://www.tensorflow.org/community</denchmark-link> ? Letting <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MarkDaoust>@MarkDaoust</denchmark-link> / <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lamberta>@lamberta</denchmark-link> add more details

Hey, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MarkDaoust>@MarkDaoust</denchmark-link> / <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lamberta>@lamberta</denchmark-link> kindly check the link provided by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mihaimaruseac>@mihaimaruseac</denchmark-link> is the correct link for "how to get help" or not.

Hey, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mihaimaruseac>@mihaimaruseac</denchmark-link> this one is offtopic, I've been participating this year GSOC. And I've completed my 1st proposal, It'll be very helpful for me if you look at it once and give your feedbacks. So, that it'll come in a more good shape. Thankyou
Hmmm ... It looks like the only relevant part is the github and SO links, which are already on the forums page. I's just delete that sentence.
